replies.body: I think just adding a mana cost to her abilities in cougar form would be enough. Making it cost something for her out of combat movement would go a long way to helping.
This! This is what would make her actually have to make choices instead of 'oh, I got caught by 4 people? WWWWWWWWW'
And make it so she needs more than the cost of a spear to do her full assassination combo.
This I'd be fine with, for sure.
